extensions.name: AppIndicator Support
extensions.desc: Adds AppIndicator, KStatusNotifierItem and legacy Tray icons support to the Shell

extensions.name: Places Status Indicator
extensions.desc: Add a menu for quickly navigating places in the system

extensions.name: Removable Drive Menu
extensions.desc: A status menu for accessing and unmounting removable devices

extensions.name: Window List
extensions.desc: Display a window list at the bottom of the screen

extensions.name: Clipboard Indicator
extensions.desc: The most popular clipboard manager for GNOME, with over 2M downloads

extensions.name: User Themes
extensions.desc: Load shell themes from user directory

extensions.name: Desktop Icons NG
extensions.desc: Adds icons to the desktop. Fork of the original Desktop Icons extension, with several enhancements

extensions.name: Rounded Window Corners
extensions.desc: Add rounded corners to all windows

extensions.name: Status Area Horizontal Spacing
extensions.desc: Reduce the horizontal spacing between icons in the top-right status area

extensions.name: Transparent Notifications
extensions.desc: Make notification banners transparent

extensions.name: Auto Move Windows
extensions.desc: Move applications to specific workspaces when they create windows

extensions.name: Improved Workspace Indicator
extensions.desc: Improved workspace indicator with customizable settings

extensions.name: Launch New Instance
extensions.desc: Always launch a new application instance for the clicked icon

extensions.name: EasyScreenCast
extensions.desc: Record your screen with a simple click

extensions.name: Impatience
extensions.desc: Speed up the GNOME Shell animation speed

extensions.name: Blur My Shell
extensions.desc: Adds blur to different parts of the GNOME Shell, including the top panel, dash, and overview

extensions.name: Just Perfection
extensions.desc: Tweak tool to customize GNOME Shell and disable UI elements

extensions.name: GNOME 4x UI Improvements
extensions.desc: Customize GNOME Shell UI (reduce padding, remove icons, etc.)

extensions.name: Vitals
extensions.desc: A glimpse into your computer's temperature, voltage, fan speed, memory usage, processor load, system resources, network speed and storage stats

extensions.name: GNOME Shell Extensions (meta-package)
extensions.desc: A collection of extensions packaged for Debian/Ubuntu; provides several useful default extensions

extensions.name: GNOME Tweaks
extensions.desc: Tweaks app for customizing small parts of GNOME (themes, fonts, extensions, etc.)

extensions.name: Extension Manager (App)
extensions.desc: GUI tool to browse and install GNOME Shell extensions from GNOME extensions website

extensions.name: Dash to Panel (packaged)
extensions.desc: Combines dash and top panel into a single unified panel. Packaged variant if available via apt

extensions.name: Dash to Dock (packaged)
extensions.desc: Makes the dash behave like a dock; often provided as a package on Debian/Ubuntu

extensions.name: Arc Menu (packaged)
extensions.desc: A more traditional applications menu for GNOME Shell; packaged variant

extensions.name: Clipboard Indicator (packaged)
extensions.desc: System clipboard indicator / history as a panel menu; packaged variant if available

extensions.name: GPaste
extensions.desc: Clipboard management system (daemon + UI) that integrates well with GNOME and extension-based clipboards

extensions.name: System Monitor (extension)
extensions.desc: Shows system metrics in the top bar (CPU, memory, network). Packaged variant if available

Essential Utilities.desc: Core utilities and indicators for everyday desktop use

UI & Appearance.desc: Customize the look and feel of your GNOME desktop

Important Extensions.desc: Core extensions and helper packages recommended for most GNOME desktops. Includes GUI helpers like Tweaks and Extension Manager, plus popular dock/menu/clipboard tools
